entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: billingMethod

constantValues: Billing method for the project quote line. Valid values are Time and Material and Fixed Price

members.description: Billing method for the project quote line. Valid values are Time and Material and Fixed Price

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'billingMethod_display' is added to the 'QuoteProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'billingMethod'
addSupportingAttribute.name: billingMethod_display

members.name: billingStartDate

constantValues: Enter the estimated start date for the billing frequency on the project.

members.description: Enter the estimated start date for the billing frequency on the project.

members.name: budgetAmount

constantValues: Enter the amount the customer has set aside or is willing to pay for the quote component.

members.description: Enter the amount the customer has set aside or is willing to pay for the quote component.

members.name: budgetAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

members.name: costAmount

constantValues: Shows the total cost price of the product based on the cost price per unit and quantity.

members.description: Shows the total cost price of the product based on the cost price per unit and quantity.

members.name: costAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the CostAmount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the CostAmount in base currency.

members.name: costPricePerUnit

constantValues: Cost per unit of the product. The default is the cost price of the product.

members.description: Cost per unit of the product. The default is the cost price of the product.

members.name: costPricePerUnitBase

constantValues: Value of the Cost Price Per Unit in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Cost Price Per Unit in base currency.

members.name: includeExpense

constantValues: Select whether to include expenses in the quote line.

members.description: Select whether to include expenses in the quote line.

members.name: includeFee

constantValues: Select whether to include fees in the quote line.

members.description: Select whether to include fees in the quote line.

members.name: includeMaterial

constantValues: Select whether to include materials in the quote line.

members.description: Select whether to include materials in the quote line.

members.name: includeTime

constantValues: Select whether to include time transactions in the quote line.

members.description: Select whether to include time transactions in the quote line.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: invoiceFrequency

constantValues: Select the frequency for the automatic invoice creation job to create the invoice.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Select the frequency for the automatic invoice creation job to create the invoice.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: lineType

constantValues: The field to distinguish the quote lines to be of project service or field service

members.description: The field to distinguish the quote lines to be of project service or field service

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'lineType_display' is added to the 'QuoteProduct' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'lineType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: lineType_display

members.name: opportunityLine

constantValues: Shows the opportunity line related to this quote line.

members.description: Shows the opportunity line related to this quote line.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: project

constantValues: Select the project related to this quote line.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Select the project related to this quote line.

members.name: quoteLineDescription

constantValues: abstracts description for product based lines vs write-in products or project based lines

members.description: abstracts description for product based lines vs write-in products or project based lines
